transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Adi sir, good morning sir.
Executive: Good morning.
Executive: Sir, main Nitish baat kar raha hun IndiaMART ke survey department se. Actually aapki call aa rahi thi sir baar baar.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Haan bataiye sir.
Customer: Ye dekhiye IndiaMART plan lene time, theek hai?
Executive: Kya sir?
Customer: Jis time India paid plan le rahe the hum IndiaMART ka.
Haan.
Customer: Us time bola gaya tha ki aapka jo aapko jo lead milega per per do per day two lead milega.
Executive: Aur per day verified hoga.
Customer: Per day do lead.
Haan.
Customer: To aur lead jo hoga lead verified lead hoga, theek hai?
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Haan.
Customer: To ek bhi lead verified rehta hai kya?
Executive: Lead verified aap lead pe baat kijiye na sir, weekly aapko.
Customer: Pehle meri baat suniye, pehle meri baat suniye, sir.
Customer: Lead verified matlab kya matlab hai? Jo koi bhi agar search karega IndiaMART pe, theek hai?
Customer: To search karega aur maan ke chaliye waha pe dikha raha hai 500 piece lega koi.
Customer: Aur call karne ke baad pata chalta hai humko ek piece ka inquiry hai.
Customer: Aur lead verified hua wo kaise?
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello bataiye.
Customer: Aur bolte the haan wahi bol rahe hai ki lead verified kaise hota hai? Jaise maan ke chaliye IndiaMART pe koi agar de raha hai waha pe.
Haan.
Customer: To service department aapko usko verify kaha kar raha hai? Bolta tha verify verify lead hai. Verify agar lead rehta hai maan ke chaliye.
Haan.
Customer: Agar 5 minute pehle maan ke chaliye wo inquiry dala hai IndiaMART pe.
Customer: To 5 minute pehle to lead verify to waha dikh raha hai ki 500 piece ye cheez lega.
Customer: Kisi ko call karne ke baad pata chalta hai kisi ka incoming band hai.
Customer: Kisi ka call receive nahi hota hai.
Customer: Matlab kisi ka jo hai matlab agar 500 piece dikha raha hai waha pe dikhata hai ki humko ek piece ka jarurat hai.
Customer: In lead verified hua kaise ye cheez bataiye humko.
Executive: Sir lead verified jo lead hoti hai na usse aapko coordinate karna hoga sir usse aapko baatein karni hogi saari cheeze aapko product ke baare mein batana hoga.
Customer: Suniye pehle meri baat product ke baare mein batana hoga na humko lena hai humko padenge ye valid to kaise milega ye baat bataiye aap aap kaha se product ki valid.
Executive: Sir aap apni product ki valid.
Customer: Meri baat suniye pehle aap aap log jo bolte hai wo log baat pe nahi rehte hai na maan ke chaliye waha pe dikha rahe hai ki humko ID card chahiye, theek hai?
Customer: Is bande ko itna ID card chahiye to hum usse call karenge.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Jaise call kiye na to jaise maan ke chaliye matra 5 minute hua hai ki dikha raha hai 5 minute pehle wo wo search kiya hai.
Haan.
Customer: To hum jaise usko kiye ki 500 piece ID wo bolta hai ki hum ek piece ke liye ID card ke liye kiye.
Customer: Theek hai maan ke chaliye ek do aisa ho sakta hai thoda der ke liye hum bhi ye cheez maan sakte hai.
Haan.
Customer: Continue matlab maan ke chaliye saptaah mein 5 din ka yahi haal hai.
Hmm.
Customer: Hum log kaise vishwas karenge ki lead verified hai?
Executive: Aapko offline bhi business hoga sir.
Customer: Lead lead verified ka matlab yahi hai ki agar usko koi bhi kiya to IndiaMART wala to khud se ye karega tabhi number dega kisi ko supplier ko.
Hmm.
Customer: To aisa kaha ho raha hai supplier ka? Sir buyer to koi bhi IndiaMART pe aa sakte hai sir aisa nahi hai na.
Customer: Koi bhi aa koi bhi aa sakte hai wo theek hai lekin lead to verified hona chahiye na aap bole the lead verified denge.
Customer: Us time ye bola gaya lead jo denge jo bhi lead hoga matlab per day two lead wo verified hoga.
Customer: To ek bhi lead to verified nahi hota hai.
Customer: Hum jis time liye to bolte ek saptaah hua to abhi isiliye abhi aur lead aayega aapko ek month month sa ho gaya hai.
Customer: To phir bhi to kuch process nahi hai abhi tak.
Executive: Coordinate kijiye abhi.
Customer: Lene se humko to fayda nahi hua aap sir aap coordinate kijiye aapki abhi starting hai IndiaMART pe aisi baat nahi hai aap abhi aap aap log suniye aap log phone pe bolte hai na aap agar me agar sale nahi hota aapka ye local area mein koi staff nahi hai idhar Baka side mein?
Customer: Kya?
Customer: Aapka staff nahi aata hai kya idhar Baka side mein koi company ki taraf se?
Executive: Company ki taraf se?
Customer: Haan marketing.
Executive: Malum karna padega.
Executive: Malum karna padega aise aap to service abhi haal filhaal liye hi hai na.
Customer: Haal filhaal liye kitna din mein ye hoga aap bataiye. Wo cheez hum nahi bol rahe hai aapke saath haal filhaal liye jo do saal se chala rahe hai wo bhi wo bhi same ko yahi cheez bol raha hai.
Executive: Kya bol raha hai jo 9 saal se chala raha hai phir agar wo 9 saal se aapko batata yahi cheez bol raha hai to phir aap IndiaMART pe aate hi nahi sir agar IndiaMART pe phir business nahi ho raha tha.
Customer: Wo wo cheez pehle wo cheez pehle nahi pata tha na.
Customer: Abhi lead verified nahi ho raha tha jo jo jo diye the wo unko call karte to wo call receive nahi karte hai.
Executive: Agar aisa baat hota sir to aap IndiaMART se baat karenge aap bataiye.
Customer: Us time pata nahi tha na us time pata nahi tha na baat karne ke baad hi pata chala na.
Executive: Kal aap system pe aa jaaiye sir buylead ko hum discuss kar lete hai actually aaj ki hai kal main discuss kar leta hu aap se agar aisa lag raha hai aapko.
Customer: Samajh gaye.
Executive: To aaj holiday hai kal main aap se system pe aake video meet pe aa jaaiye main discuss kar leta hu har buylead ko aapki.
Customer: Suniye mera problem yahi hai 100 baat ka ek baat seedha seedha suniye jo lead agar verified dikha raha hai theek hai sir jo search kiya theek hai?
Customer: Maan ke chaliye agar search dikha raha hai ki humko ID card chahiye, theek hai?
Hmm.
Customer: Uspe jo hum call karenge theek hai usko hum product ke baare mein samjhayenge aapka yahi kehna hai na.
Customer: Hum product ke baare mein usko 530 nahi usko ek piece chahiye, theek hai? Sir aap wahi sir aap wahi.
Executive: Buylead ko consume kijiye jo ek piece chahiye wo buylead nahi consume kijiye na.
Customer: Wo wo kaise wo kaise pata chalega humko ye cheez aap batate hai sir wo ek piece kaise pata chalega.
Executive: Wo uski requirement waha pe dali hoti hai na.
Customer: Waha pe na requirement dali hoti hai na.
Haan.
Customer: Haan ki kitni unki requirement hai product ki quantity dali hoti hai na ki kitni quantity ki.
Haan. Wahi cheez to hum bol rahe hai aap log to sun sakte nahi hai na 500 piece waha pe requirement dikha raha hai uska, theek hai?
Haan. Lekin call karne ke baad wo bolta hai humko ek piece chahiye.
Executive: Call karne ke baad matlab bolte hai ek piece chahiye sir actually ye hota hai na ki aapne buylead late se consume kiye honge unki kahi na kahi requirement fulfill ho gayi hogi.
Customer: Yahi cheez ke liye hum bolte hai na aap agar koi staff hai is area mein bhejiye uske samne hum karenge kitna time lead kitna time lead generate hone hua aur kitna time mein hum call kiye yahi cheez to dikhana hai samne tab to pata chalega.
Customer: 5 minute hota hai 5 minute ke andar call karte hai aur kisi kisi ko 2 minute ke andar call karte hai phir bhi yahi haal hai ye hota hai ek ek do lead aisa hota hai to maan ke chaliye hum maan sakte hai thoda der ke liye.
Haan.
Customer: Aaj bhi do lead call kiye wahi haal hai parso kiye wahi haal hai.
Customer: Aur 4 din pehle kiye the wahi haal hai.
Customer: Aur jinse liye the na jo humko call kiye the India matlab jinke through matlab payment hua tha.
Hmm. Unko call karte the wo call ek do baar bole the wo bole the hum company mein baat karke aapko batayenge unko call karte the call receive nahi karte hai.
Customer: Jab bola ki IndiaMART pe jo do lead milega wo verified hoga.
Customer: Verified ka yahi matlab hai na ki IndiaMART inquiry kar lega us number ka uske baad hi lead dega us pe.
Executive: Sir verify sara lead verified hota hai but koi buyer aise hote hai.
Customer: Ye ye cheez ye cheez kaise maan le aap verified hai aap aake bataiye.
Executive: Sir unki requirement aati hai hoti kya hai sir.
Customer: Online market mein agar lead verified hota hai suniye pehle lead agar verified hota hai na maan ke chaliye agar koi aur aisa bhi hota hai maan ke chaliye waha pe dikha raha hai ki ye bench bench ke liye search kar raha hai school bench usko chahiye thoda der ke liye.
Customer: To wo wo theek hai dikha raha hai kitna piece chahiye humko usko call karne ke baad pata chalega usko to wahi bench banane ka machine chahiye sir to verified kaise hua ye cheez bataiye aap humko.
Customer: Usko service team usko call hi nahi kiya hai.
Customer: Agar call karta to waha se log kya log hat sakta hai na.
Executive: Sir aapke paas online bhi offline bhi market mein hoti kya hai na ki agar aapke turant unhe convert nahi karte hai turant unhe nahi batayenge apne product ke baare mein aapke paas agar aate hai reply nahi karenge to jahir si baat hai kahi na kahi wo fulfill to apni requirement karenge hi.
Customer: To hum kya bol rahe hai aap kya sun rahe hai aap bataiye ye cheez.
Executive: Kya?
Customer: Ye requirement ka baat alag me ho raha hai ye hum kya aapko kya bol rahe hai itna der se aap kya sun rahe hai waha dikhata hai.
Executive: Aap baar baar wahi ek hi baat bol rahe hai ki verified verified.
Customer: Kya bolenge verified nahi bolenge maan ke chaliye waha waha bol raha hai ki hum hum hum bench lenge theek hai?
Hmm. Hum bench lenge to call karne ke baad kya usko bench hi chahiye na maan ke chaliye uska requirement pura ho gaya thoda der ke liye aap aapka hi baat kar rahe hai.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Abhi bhi aapka call aa raha hai ek number se.
Customer: Ek second rukiyega.
(On hold music).
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer questions lead verification process.

- States leads are not verified as promised.

- Expresses dissatisfaction with lead quality.

- Wants local staff to resolve issues.



Resolution:

- Executive asked to coordinate for resolution.

- Suggested a video meet to discuss buyleads.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will discuss buyleads in video meet.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, verification, subscription, staff
